section.name: Using Jadabs-IM
section.p: Jadabs-IM can be built, deployed and run almost automatically. This section describes how to setup Jadabs-IM in general and also explains the graphical user interface.

ul.li: Messenger Overview provides a short manual on how to use the Jadabs Messenger
Setup Information provides more detailed information on how to setup the whole infrstructure on the different platforms
